row.value: La regla de pago indica el método como la factura será pagada - puede sobreescribir el valor de la factura.

value.original: The email is sent from the user selected - otherwise it is sent from the request email address of the client

value.original: If the DRP Required checkbox is ticked, this means it has been a change in some element which affect the material plan for this product, i.e Network Distribution, Orders, Inventory, MPS, etc. and therefore you need to executed again DRP to adjust the Planned Orders to the new conditions and to get the updated action messages.

row.value: If the DRP Required checkbox is ticked, this means it has been a change in some element which affect the material plan for this product, i.e Network Distribution, Orders, Inventory, MPS, etc. and therefore you need to executed again DRP to adjust the Planned Orders to the new conditions and to get the updated action messages.
